name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.job.task.listener.thread-count
description:
The number of threads used to handle RPC calls in the
    MR AppMaster from remote tasks

name: hadoop.caller.context.max.size
description:
The maximum bytes a caller context string can have. If the
      passed caller context is longer than this maximum bytes, client will
      truncate it before sending to server. Note that the server may have a
      different maximum size, and will truncate the caller context to the
      maximum size it allows.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.max.outstanding.paths
description:
Defines the maximum number of paths to satisfy that can be queued up in the
    Satisfier call queue in a period of time. Default value is 10000.

name: ipc.server.listen.queue.size
description:
Indicates the length of the listen queue for servers accepting
               client connections.

name: dfs.namenode.path.based.cache.refresh.interval.ms
description:
The amount of milliseconds between subsequent path cache rescans.  Path
    cache rescans are when we calculate which blocks should be cached, and on
    what datanodes.

    By default, this parameter is set to 30 seconds.
